fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use an ability from any other role once per phase.

- Permanently copy an ability from a role, 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not use an ability from the same role twice, additionally, you may not use abilities that would give you another ability (outside of your own).

- Anytime you perform an ability, It will be publically revealed which one you used, But not your name.

- Abilities will still be affected by the original role's attributes.
